players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
You: "I saw Diana talking to Bob last night. He might be the mafioso."
Bob: "I saw Diana talking to Bob last night. I think he might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana. Alice and I saw her talking to Bob last night, so he might be the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Alice: "I saw Diana talking to Bob last night. He might be the mafioso."
You: "I saw Diana talking to Bob last night. I think he might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana. Alice and I saw her talking to Bob last night, so he might be the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
